import LabelHiddenGraph from '../../../example/Graphs-Carbon/General/Axes/LabelHidden?dev-site-example';

require('details-polyfill');

# Label Hidden

Label hidden contains simple graph examples related to label like label hidden and axis label truncation in x, y and y2 axes.

## Getting Started

- Install with [npmjs](https://www.npmjs.com):
  - `npm i @cerner/carbon-graphs --save-dev`

## Usage
```js
import Carbon from '@cerner/carbon-graphs';
```

## Examples

</details>
